entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Goderich 11:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

Humidity: 79 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. High zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 9:03 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
